roleset.name: make payment, give (perhaps for consideration)

example.name: remit-v: all args
example.text: Recently , the " Duan and Duan Law Firm " remitted the claims , totaling 1.850 million US dollars , to the three enterprises .

propbank.arg: the " Duan and Duan Law Firm "
the claims , totaling 1.850 million US dollars

example.name: remit-v: passive, with theme and recipient
example.text: During checks , it discovered that some corporations and individuals made use of foreign trading companies that have import and export operation rights , allowing them to perform " import agent " business , used false customs documents to cheat on exchange , in order to get foreign exchange capital through tax evasion and smuggling , while the foreign trading companies earned agent commission fees without any cost ; there was also some international speculative capital which infiltrated regular items to get remitted into the country ; or entered the domestic stockmarket for speculating , or false custom documents were purchased to purchase exchange to derive profit from the exchange differences within Chinese territory .

example.name: remit-n
example.text: The third question is , whether this is not a case in which we are entitled to make a remit without the consent of parties .

example.name: remission-n
example.text: The earned credit will be posted to my transcript upon remission of payment of $ 50.00 per credit with a grade of “ P ” ( Pass ) .

propbank.arg: of payment of $ 50.00 per credit with a grade of “ P ” ( Pass )

roleset.note: REMIT-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from remit.01-v)

roleset.name: abate in intensity

role.descr: abating for whom; entity experiencing abatement of ARG1

example.name: remission-n: non-cancer and with the elusive arg 0!
example.text: effects of catecholamine depletion on antidepressant - induced remission of depression

example.name: in_remission-m, ARGs 1 and 2
example.text: She is in remission from colon cancer .
example.amr: (r / remission-02 :ARG1 (c / cancer-03 :ARG1 s2 :ARG2 (a4 / anatomical-site :name (n2 / name :op1 "colon"))) :ARG2 (s2 / she))

roleset.note: NOTES: ARG2, in_remission alias added for THYME-AMR.
REMISSION-N NOTES: Based on Sharp data. Comparison to abate.01 and subside.01. No Vn or Fn classes. Framed by Katie. (from remission.01-n)
